name: All That You Leave Behind
description:
All That You Leave Behind is a game? visual novel? interactive fiction? You see the world through the eyes of a person who lies dying on a street corner. Strangers come and talk to you. Some offer sympathy, and some offer judgment. You can't affect the story. All you can do is wait for your time to run out.

Playtime ~ 40 minutes. There is no interaction in the entire game except going to the next piece of dialog.
